briefTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study to Evaluate STS101 in the Acute Treatment of Migraine
officialTitle: EMERGE: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Parallel Group, Placebo-Controlled, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Efficacy, Safety, and Tolerability of Single Doses of STS101 (Dihydroergotamine Nasal Powder) in the Acute Treatment of Migraine
summary: Study STS101-002 is a randomized, double-blind, parallel group, placebo-controlled, multicenter study to evaluate the efficacy, safety, and tolerability of single doses of STS101 (dihydroergotamine nasal powder) in the acute treatment of migraine

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects With Freedom From Migraine Headache Pain at 2 Hours Post Dose
